name: Creative Tugs
description:
Creative Tugs established since 2012, We are a website design and digital marketing agency based out of Karachi Pakistan formally was AJK Digital focusing on small to medium size businesses
We are a specialized IT Services & Solutions company providing Web/Mobile/Open Source/ecommerce Application Development Services; Web Designs (UI/UX); Social Media/Payment Gateway/3rd Party API Integrations; Cloud Hosting Solutions; QA/Testing etc.
We have been dealing with a number of firms across the globe, mainly within USA, UK, Canada, Latin Americas, UAE, Singapore, Taiwan, Australia, India and many other countries
